text.div:
AdverseEventCategory

Overall categorization of the event, e.g. product-related or situational.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/adverse-event-category defines the following codes:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinition
1product-problem Product ProblemThe adverse event pertains to a product problem.
1product-quality Product QualityThe adverse event pertains to product quality.
1product-use-error Product Use ErrorThe adverse event pertains to a product use error.
2  wrong-dose Wrong DoseThe adverse event pertains to a wrong dose.
2  incorrect-prescribing-information Incorrect Prescribing InformationThe adverse event pertains to incorrect perscribing information.
2  wrong-technique Wrong TechniqueThe adverse event pertains to a wrong technique.
2  wrong-route-of-administration Wrong Route of AdministrationThe adverse event pertains to a wrong route of administration.
2  wrong-rate Wrong RateThe adverse event pertains to a wrong rate.
2  wrong-duration Wrong DurationThe adverse event pertains to a wrong duration.
2  wrong-time Wrong TimeThe adverse event pertains to a wrong time.
2  expired-drug Expired DrugThe adverse event pertains to an expired drug.
1medical-device-use-error Medical Device Use ErrorThe adverse event pertains to a medical device use error.
1problem-different-manufacturer Problem with Different Manufacturer of Same MedicineThe adverse event pertains to a problem with a different manufacturer of the same medication.
1unsafe-physical-environment Unsafe Physical EnvironmentThe adverse event pertains to an unsafe physical environment.

name: AdverseEventCategory
title: AdverseEventCategory
description: Overall categorization of the event, e.g. product-related or situational.

concept.definition: The adverse event pertains to a product problem.

The adverse event pertains to a medical device use error.

concept.display: Problem with Different Manufacturer of Same Medicine
concept.definition: The adverse event pertains to a problem with a different manufacturer of the same medication.
The adverse event pertains to an unsafe physical environment.
